TopicTitle: X box update, now SAS and RCS will not function.

Articles.Content:
My Xbox did an update this morning.  Now when I try to fly, the SAS and RCS will function for a few minutes, but then become greyed out.  Not functioning at all.  I have tried reloading several times, but still the same issue.  I have 3 Kerbals stuck in an elliptical orbit after a botched Mun landing attempt.  Would like to recover them with a rescue mission, but every time I fly the SAS and RCS go out.  Sometimes on launch, other times it is good till I get to orbit.

Anyone else seen this?
are you able to manually control your ship?    or have you lost all control of everything?
